title: How much should the public know about COVID-19 cases? It depends who you ask
description: New Brunswickers know how many cases of COVID-19 have been reported in their province, but not how many are linked to community transmission.
content: New Brunswickers know how many cases of COVID have been reported in their province but not how many are linked to community transmission They don t know how many are male or female a detail the province stopped releasing last week following a complain chars
